subject: Auctions
Halls of Fame
World Series
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Phil Rizzuto, the oldest living member of the Baseball Hall of Fame, had his Most Valuable Player Award from the 1950 season sold at auction for $175,000.
snippet: Phil Rizzuto, the oldest living member of the Baseball Hall of Fame, had his Most Valuable Player Award from the 1950 season sold at auction for $175,000.
